Info.Name: Bootstrap Accordion Item
Info.Description: Individual accordion item with header and collapsible content

GenericProperty.Name: Initial State Shown
GenericProperty.Description: Whether this item is initially expanded or collapsed

GenericProperty.Name: Disabled
GenericProperty.Description: Whether this accordion item is disabled

GenericProperty.Name: Custom CSS Class
GenericProperty.Description: Additional CSS classes for this accordion item

Info.Name: Bootstrap Carousel Item
Info.Description: Individual carousel slide item with image, header, and content

Info.Name: Bootstrap Grid Column
Info.Description: Bootstrap Grid Column element for responsive layouts

Info.Name: Bootstrap Tab Item
Info.Description: Individual tab item with title and content

GenericProperty.Name: Title
GenericProperty.Description: Tab title displayed in the tab header

GenericProperty.Name: Tab ID
GenericProperty.Description: Optional custom tab ID (auto-generated if empty)

PartialViews.View:
@Model.Header

@Html.Raw(Model.Description)

@foreach (var item in Model.Buttons) { @item.Name }

DataType.Name: Bootstrap Grid Column Size
DataType.Configuration: {"multiple":false,"items":["12 Column (100%)","11 Column (92%)","10 Column (83%)","9 Column (75%)","8 Column (66%)","7 Column (58%)","6 Column (50%)","5 Column (42%)","4 Column (33%)","3 Column (25%)","2 Column (16%)","1 Column (8%)"]}
